channel.title: Jozef Reisinger's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Jozef Reisinger's Blog

item.title: waf-tester: testing WAF rules
item.description: I've been working with WAFs for some time and to make my work easier I created couple of tools.

item.title: runp: run shell commands in parallel
item.description: I'm using shell (bash specifically) on daily basis. From time to time a need arises to run multiple commands in parallel.

item.title: Perl one-liners
item.description: I think Perl one-liners are still super useful. They are small Perl programs that are run directly from command line.

item.title: Testing Perl script
item.description: At $work, I was to upgrade several Debians from Squeezy through Wheezy to Jessie (6 to 8).

item.title: My First CPAN Contribution
item.description: Last week I uploaded App::Monport to CPAN. I did it to try out the CPAN toolchain and to get a feeling of accomplishment :-).
